it.polimi.dima.mediatracker.external_services.rest_interfaces

Interface TVShowRestInterface


  • public interface TVShowRestInterface
    REST interface to communicate with the TV shows external service API

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      retrofit2.Call<TVShowJSON> getTVShowInfo(java.lang.String tvShowId, java.lang.String apiKey)
      Get data for a specific TV show
      retrofit2.Call<TVShowSeasonJSON> getTVShowNextEpisodeDate(java.lang.String tvShowId, int lastSeasonNumber, java.lang.String apiKey)

      Searches TV shows

    • Method Detail

      • searchTVShows

        @GET(value="search/tv/?")
retrofit2.Call<TVShowSearchJSON> searchTVShows(@Query(value="query")
                                                                          java.lang.String query,
                                                                          @Query(value="api_key")
                                                                          java.lang.String apiKey)
        Searches TV shows
        Parameters:
        query - the title to search
        apiKey - the service API key
        Returns:
        a search JSON representation

      • getTVShowInfo

        @GET(value="tv/{tvShowId}?")
retrofit2.Call<TVShowJSON> getTVShowInfo(@Path(value="tvShowId")
                                                                       java.lang.String tvShowId,
                                                                       @Query(value="api_key")
                                                                       java.lang.String apiKey)
        Get data for a specific TV show
        Parameters:
        tvShowId - the ID of the TV show
        apiKey - the service API key
        Returns:
        the TV show JSON representation

      • getTVShowNextEpisodeDate

        @GET(value="tv/{tvShowId}/season/{lastSeasonNumber}?")
retrofit2.Call<TVShowSeasonJSON> getTVShowNextEpisodeDate(@Path(value="tvShowId")
                                                                                                                  java.lang.String tvShowId,
                                                                                                                  @Path(value="lastSeasonNumber")
                                                                                                                  int lastSeasonNumber,
                                                                                                                  @Query(value="api_key")
                                                                                                                  java.lang.String apiKey)
        Retrieves the next episode date for a given TV show
        Parameters:
        tvShowId - the ID of the TV show
        lastSeasonNumber - the number of the last season
        apiKey - the service API key
        Returns:
        a TV show season JSON representation
